alert.note: Alert for Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 6:14PM EDT by NWS Albany
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Hamilton, western Fulton, Herkimer and western Montgomery Counties through 645 PM EDT... At 613 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 10 miles southeast of Star Lake to Ohio to West Winfield. Movement was northeast at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rains could cause ponding of water on roadways. Locations impacted include... Ilion, Herkimer, Little Falls, Canajoharie, Speculator, Old Forge, Mohawk, Frankfort, Fort Plain, Dolgeville, St. Johnsville, Ephratah, Ohio, West Winfield, Newport, Stratford, Middleville, Poland, Inlet and Cold Brook. This includes Interstate 90 between exits 29 and 30. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Hamilton; Montgomery; Northern Fulton; Northern Herkimer; Southern Fulton; Southern Herkimer
